import React from "react"; import data from "../data"; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector( state => state.productDetails) const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ):( Unavailable )}
); } export default ProductScreen;
